page.title: 10Gargrave, Tourism 2.
page.content: The Singing Kettle Restaurant, The Dalesman Cafe, the restaurant at the Fish and Chip Shop and the cafe at the Bakery are all kept very busy during the summer, as are the shops. {High Green} is a popular picnic place as the river is safe for small children to play in. {Country Holidays}is a Gargrave company responsible for the letting of a wide range of holiday properties all over Great Britain. A normal staff of 14 is assisted by a 14 terminal computer with 3 printers. Up to 22 people may be employed during the busy booking period of Jan. / Feb.
